CustomField.formula: IF( Month(CloseDate) = 1, 'January', IF( Month(CloseDate) = 2, 'February', IF( Month(CloseDate) = 3, 'March', IF( Month(CloseDate) = 4, 'April', IF( Month(CloseDate) = 5, 'May', IF( Month(CloseDate) = 6, 'June', IF( Month(CloseDate) = 7, 'July', IF( Month(CloseDate) = 8, 'August', IF( Month(CloseDate) = 9, 'September', IF( Month(CloseDate) = 10, 'October', IF( Month(CloseDate) = 11, 'November', IF( Month(CloseDate) = 12, 'December', null))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Closing Month
